name: QuizMaster Legends
description:
Welcome to QuizMaster Legends!

In this Game you will face off against the legendary QuizMaster himself!
He will ask you a exactly ten tricky questions and you should make sure to answer them. Whenever you answer a question you get points! Or rather crystals.
Get enough crystals and maybe you win something! But there is another thing. This is very important and I don't want to make you nervous..
but if you can't answer them you die.

This game was made by me in the context of an assignment for my studies. Everything was made in five days, not because that was a requirement, but because I'm good at procrastinating. There are still a few things that could be tuned but overall its a complete game. It may not have the deepest mechanics but it was made with love.

I hope you enjoy playing the game and if you have any feedback I would love to hear it.

-SyntecTK
